messages.message: Hey team, this sandbox (https://sandbox.console.instabase.com/customer/Engineering/tenant/core-svcs-host/info) has status running, but when I try to access it, the website throws the error `Backend service does not exist`. I tried to create a tenant hosted on this host and also encountered the same error. Does anyone know the possible reasons and potential fixes? Thank you!
Host deployments only run a limited number of services to support its tenants. I don’t think these envs are meant to be accessible through the browser
which sandbox are you seeing the same issue for?

It looks like environment creation failed while building several services: https://jenkins.instabase.com/job/build-services/19455/console. If the errors don’t seem related to your changes I would run the update again and make sure to check “Run as base install” to true
I see. Let me try to update again.
@William Helmrath I tried to check “Run as base install” to true and update the sandbox. But I still encounter the same issue.
Looks like the create succeeded this time, we probably just need to manually sync the argo app
can you open the argo link on the tenant page and run the Sync button in the top nav bar
The sandbox is working now. Thank you, William!
